code:
graph TD
    subgraph "Tree Detection"
        PLR[Player Location] --> SCAN[Scan 15-block radius]
        SCAN --> LOGS[Find LOG blocks]
        LOGS --> CLUSTER[Group into tree clusters]
        CLUSTER --> BASE[Calculate tree base location]
        BASE --> CHECK{Already cut?}
        CHECK -->|No| ADD[Add to nearbyTrees]
        CHECK -->|Yes| SKIP[Skip tree]
        ADD --> TREES[Tree list with coordinates]
    end
    
    subgraph "Tree Cutting Process"
        REQ[Player requests tree cutting] --> LLM[LLM identifies tree]
        LLM --> COORD[Get tree coordinates]
        COORD --> MOVE[NPC walks to tree]
        MOVE --> START[Start cutting sequence]
        
        START --> HEIGHT[Check current height level]
        HEIGHT --> FINDLOGS[Find LOG blocks at height]
        FINDLOGS --> HASLOG{Logs found?}
        
        HASLOG -->|Yes| CUT[Cut one LOG block]
        HASLOG -->|No| NEXTH[Move to next height]
        
        CUT --> EFFECTS[Sound + Particles + Face block]
        EFFECTS --> WOOD[Give wood to player]
        WOOD --> MORE{More logs at level?}
        
        MORE -->|Yes| HEIGHT
        MORE -->|No| NEXTH
        
        NEXTH --> MAXH{Height > 15?}
        MAXH -->|No| HEIGHT
        MAXH -->|Yes| DONE[Tree cutting complete]
        
        DONE --> MARK[Mark tree as cut]
        MARK --> COMPLETE[Cutting finished]
    end
    
    subgraph "Cut Tree Registry"
        MARK --> REGISTRY[Cut Trees Set - ConcurrentHashMap.newKeySet]
        REGISTRY --> KEY[Location key: x_y_z_world]
        KEY --> PERSIST[Persistent until cleared]
        PERSIST --> PREVENT[Prevents re-scanning]
    end
    
    style SCAN fill:#e8f5e8
    style CUT fill:#ffebee
    style EFFECTS fill:#fff3e0
    style REGISTRY fill:#f3e5f5
repo_description: Intelligent Agentic NPCs for Minecraft with LLM Integration
